about_the_game:
In the depths of a forgotten laboratory, a plant awakens.

Spring Escape Deep Down Demo is here! Offering one last look at the world of Spring Escape before its release! With lots of challenges to face, secrets to uncover, and a threat lurking in the background...

This demo includes:

  • 4 levels full of obstacles

  • 10 purchasable colors for your flowery friend

  • Blossom time, a time attack mode unlocked upon beating a level, think you can reach the top of the leaderboard on all of them?

  • NPS logs, get enough drop crystals on every level to uncover the buried details of the laboratory

  • A dangerous creature blocking the way forward

WHAT IS SPRING ESCAPE?

Spring Escape is a thrilling 2D platformer about a flower and a piece of dirt, Patchy and Tulip

Waking up in the depths of a destroyed laboratory, this duo sets out to find a way to the surface, a journey where they'll have to prove to be true heroes.

The road ahead is filled with obstacles, enemies, challenges, and not-too-helpful allies, will these two find a way out while discovering the truth behind this place, the world outside and themselves?

Spring Escape aims to be a simple, yet packed and extremely enjoyable game, not breaking new grounds but providing a constant quality and fun experience. With a linear yet compelling story, an exciting campaign and lots of side and post-game content that will have you replay the game in wildly different ways and face brand new threats.

Like any great platformer worth its name, Spring Escape features a cast of creative and wholly unique bosses, these giants creatures are a major highlight of the game. And don't think they'll stop giving problems past the credits.

name: Spring Escape Deep Down Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030 (2 GB) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An action packed 2D platformer about diving through dirt and moving through countless obstacles.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support
